entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 2. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:00 AM ADT Thursday 28 April 2016
